name: A black beaded rosary
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the spell 'mark of zomm'.
It decreases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It gives tiny bonus to the spell 'harm body'.
Its powers are greater with the true believers, especially with those
